resourceOpts.subtitle: Suicide Prevention & Survivors
resourceOpts.description: Is someone you love at risk? Learn some of the early warning signs, and discover what we can do together to help prevent suicides in our community.

resourceOpts.subtitle: Youth & Family
resourceOpts.description: Struggling to keep the peace? Knowledge is power. Find out how to improve relationships between teens and parents, so everyone can thrive.

resourceOpts.subtitle: Victims of Crime
resourceOpts.description: Not sure where to turn? Consider our list of local organizations dedicated to helping people cope with crime-related issues and challenges.

resourceOpts.subtitle: Physical & Mental Health
resourceOpts.description: Is Someone you know experiencing a mental health or other type of crisis? Learn more about helpful programs and services available here in our community.
